nodes.text: Trade Baron Lufa Danak was a male Neimoidian who was a former defense attorney and served as Trade Federation Senator Lott Dod's aide in the Galactic Senate during the Invasion of Naboo.

A former defence attorney, Trade Baron Lufa Danak served as Trade Federation Senator Lott Dod's aide in the Galactic Senate. In the year 32 BBY, he was present in Dod's repulsorpod alongside him and his advisor, Mik Regrap, when Senator Palpatine and Queen Padmé Amidala of Naboo accused the Trade Federation of invading their homeworld.
Claiming to know every loophole in the Senate's by-laws, Lufa Danak was a male Neimoidian with green skin and red eyes.
Danak wore a blue and gray robe, as well as a diplomatic ploov.

Originally created for the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, Lufa Danak first appeared in its Star Wars Legends novelization by Terry Brooks, where he was referred to simply as a "trade baron". He was first identified in The Devious Neimoidians Revealed, an article published in Star Wars Insider 147.
